description: Execution metrics for Linera validators including block execution latency, operation processing, message handling, and WebAssembly performance statistics.

panels.description: Time taken to execute a block, including all operations and state transitions
panels.title: Block Execution Latency

panels.description: Time taken to execute a single operation within a block
panels.title: Operation Execution Latency

panels.description: Time taken to execute a cross-chain message
panels.title: Message Execution Latency

panels.description: Time taken to decompress WebAssembly bytecode before execution
panels.title: Bytecode Decompression Latency

panels.description: Time taken to compute cryptographic hash of chain state
panels.title: State Hash Computation Latency

panels.description: Time messages spend waiting in the cross-chain message queue
panels.title: Cross Chain Queue Wait Time

panels.description: Time requests spend waiting in the chain worker processing queue
panels.title: Chain Worker Request Queue Wait Time

panels.description: Time taken to create and process network initialization actions
panels.title: Create Network Actions Latency

panels.description: Ratio of cache hits to total cache accesses for value cache

targets.expr:
sum by (validator) (rate(linera_value_cache_hit{validator=~"$validator"}[1m]))
/
(
  sum by (validator) (rate(linera_value_cache_hit{validator=~"$validator"}[1m]))
+ (
    sum by (validator) (rate(linera_value_cache_miss{validator=~"$validator"}[1m]))
    or on (validator) vector(0)
  )
)

panels.title: Value Cache Hit Ratio

panels.description: Rate at which new chains are being opened in the network
panels.title: Chains Opened per Second (1m avg)

panels.description: Rate at which blocks are being added to chains
panels.title: Blocks Added to Chains per Second (1m avg)

panels.description: Rate at which blocks are being executed by validators
panels.title: Blocks Executed per Second (1m avg)

panels.description: Rate of transaction processing across the network
panels.title: Transactions per Second (1m avg)

panels.description: Rate of individual operations being executed
panels.title: Operations per Second (1m avg)

panels.description: Rate of incoming message bundles from other chains
panels.title: Incoming Bundles per Second (1m avg)

panels.description: Rate of incoming messages from other chains
panels.title: Incoming Messages per Second (1m avg)

panels.description: Rate at which the cross-chain message channel reaches capacity
panels.title: Cross Chain Message Channel Full per Second (1m avg)

panels.description: Rate at which the cross-chain message channel reaches capacity
panels.title: Notifications Skipped - Receiver lag, per Second (1m avg)

panels.description: Rate at which the cross-chain message channel reaches capacity
panels.title: Notifications dropped - No receiver, per Second (1m avg)

panels.description: Rate at which each validator is signing certificates
panels.title: Certificates Signed per Second per Validator (1m avg)

panels.description: Number of inbox queues maintained by each chain
panels.title: Number of Inboxes

panels.description: Number of outbox queues maintained by each chain
panels.title: Number of Outboxes

panels.description: Number of messages pending in chain inbox queues
panels.title: Inbox Size

panels.description: Number of messages pending in chain outbox queues
panels.title: Outbox Size

panels.description: Number of message bundles removed during processing
panels.title: Removed Bundles

panels.description: Number of consensus rounds in block proposal phase
panels.title: Rounds in Block Proposal

panels.description: Number of consensus rounds required to create a certificate
panels.title: Rounds in Certificate

panels.description: Total number of certificates signed by each validator
panels.title: Certificates Signed per Validator

panels.description: Time taken to instantiate a WebAssembly contract module
panels.title: Wasm Contract Instantiation Latency

panels.description: Time taken to instantiate a WebAssembly service module
panels.title: Wasm Service Instantiation Latency

panels.description: Amount of WebAssembly execution fuel consumed per block
panels.title: Wasm Fuel Used per Block

panels.description: Number of storage read operations during WebAssembly execution per block
panels.title: Wasm Num Reads per Block

panels.description: Total bytes read from storage during WebAssembly execution per block
panels.title: Wasm Bytes Read per Block

panels.description: Total bytes written to storage during WebAssembly execution per block
panels.title: Wasm Bytes Written per Block

panels.description: Distribution of operations per confirmed block
panels.title: Operations Per Block

panels.description: Distribution of incoming message bundles per confirmed block
panels.title: Incoming Bundles Per Block

panels.description: Distribution of transactions per confirmed block
panels.title: Transactions Per Block

title: Execution
